data.title: Hollywood Forever

data.text:
« All Events

This event has passed.

Empire Records

- 11:30 pm

$22

Directed by Allan Moyle (1995, 90 minutes)

Hollywood Forever Cemetery /

Gates – 7:15pm / Movie – 9pm

The Empire Strikes Back! Ready for a record scratch revolution? The fiery fan favorite rages against the corporate machine with an all-star cast of cool kids and ingenues: Liv Tyler, Renee Zellweger, Robin Tunney, Ethan Embry, Coyote Shivers, and more. The good times flow with our Beer and Wine Bar. Party hard in a gorgeous LA landmark while DJs bring the soundtrack to life. Damn the Man!
